title: reshape
desc: change the dimensionality of a matrix without changing the underlying data

input.name: shape
input.description: array of integers where: 1) length of array  number of  output dimensions and 2) each integer specifies the number of values for a given dimension.  If the integer is -1 that dimension is sized to fit the data. i.e. [-1,2,3] for a 24 value array means a 4x2x3 matrix
